fullDescription.intro: A 2D convolution layer. Corresponds to the Conv2D Keras layer .
fullDescription.option: The dimensionality of the output space (i.e. the number of output filters in the convolution).
The width and height of the 2D convolution window. Can be a single integer to specify the same value for all spatial dimensions.
The the strides of the convolution along the width and height. Can be a single integer to specify the same value for all spatial dimensions
If checked, a bias vector will be used.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Conv2D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Conv2D layer.
